scripts.build: (cd elm-prefab; yarn install; yarn build; cd ..)
scripts.test:generate-api: (yarn clean && mkdir output && cp -r templates/* output && yarn build; node ./elm-prefab/dist/index.js src/Generate.elm  --debug --flags-from=./examples/playground/example-config.json)
scripts.test:api: yarn test:generate-api ; cd output ; elm make Main.elm
scripts.generate:engine-bindings: yarn generate:engine-docs; yarn elm-prefab install templates/engine-docs.json
scripts.generate:engine-docs: cd templates ; rm -rf elm-stuff ; elm-doc-preview --output engine-docs.json ; cd ..
